adjective.description: Making a harsh, high-pitched sound when being moved or when pressure or weight is applied.
examples: he boards a creaking wooden boat

adjective.description: Showing weakness or frailty under strain.
examples: they have to rely on a creaking transport system

noun.description: Harsh, high-pitched noise made when something is being moved or when pressure or weight is applied to it.
examples: we could hear the creaking of the deteriorating wood
